sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 10, 2026 –

Bucks Run is groomed for skate and classic skiing. The connector trail between the ski center and Bucks Run is open. For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.
Will be open February 14th & February 15th weather permitting. Trails are groomed.

sections.header: Ski rentals are required to be purchased in advance online.
sections.content: Click here to rent ski equipment. If you’re having difficulty with our online rental process, click here for a quick reference guide on how to rent ski equipment online.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Brilliant sunshine & blue skies.  39 degrees when I finished skate skiing today. Blue high speed wax good to 21 degrees was good enough for me.  No new grooming but Cedar Trace was lovely for two loops - only had to dodge a small bit of animal litter and footsteps (who in the world are these residents that walk on skate decks!?  I always like to think they just need larger signage).Bucks was soft....Was hearing the 1994 Tune, "Here Comes the Hotstepper" --- Am wondering if spreading of snow on the golf course and Coyote Connector could keep things covered in coming days. Snow dance underway...

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Fresh groom this morning for the skate deck & classic tracks. Exceptional conditions!!!

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be power tilled and tracked this morning. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: The deep freeze streak will finally be broken today as the temperature is forecast to rise slightly above freezing. The snow is machine groomed and in great shape for making turns on the fresh corduroy. The soup of the day is an amazing seafood chowder. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The lifts will turn from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
